Description:
Enterprises around the world are looking to do more with AI—but complexity often stands in the way. That’s why Microsoft and Oracle have partnered to deliver the most comprehensive, enterprise-ready solution for Oracle workloads in the public cloud. With Oracle Database@Azure, organizations can make mission-critical workloads AI-ready through simplified migration, integrated security, and AI-optimized infrastructure—backed by the broadest regional footprint for enterprise workloads. And because the service offers full parity with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) across solutions, pricing, licensing, and support, customers can modernize with confidence, knowing they get the same Oracle experience they rely on today, now integrated directly into Azure.

Attend one of the **Oracle AI World Tour** events below and stop by the Microsoft booth to speak with our experts, explore demos, and learn more about Oracle Database@Azure. Be sure to join our theater session, “How to Modernize Oracle Workloads with Oracle Database@Azure,” where you’ll discover how to streamline enterprise migration and modernization—from initial assessment to seamless migration and post-migration AI innovation. Learn how Microsoft security solutions like Sentinel and Defender help detect and remediate threats, while encryption and integrated key management help you meet strict regulatory and sovereignty requirements for secure, compliant data operations. Explore how Microsoft Foundry and Copilot Studio empowers organizations to transform Oracle estates into AI-driven environments. This session covers the full journey, offering tools and programs that accelerate secure, scalable deployments. Whether you’re beginning to explore AI or scaling enterprise innovation, you’ll leave with practical strategies to lead in the era of intelligent applications.

Join us at one of these five city stops:

- **Amsterdam, Netherlands** - [January 29](https://www.oracle.com/nl/ai-world-tour/)
- **London, United Kingdom** - [March 24](https://www.oracle.com/uk/ai-world-tour/)
- **Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates** – [March 26](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/)
- **New York City, United States** - [April 9](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/)
- **Tokyo, Japan** - [April 16](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/)

These events are free to attend. [Sign up](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/) today for more details!

Learn more about Oracle Database@Azure at [www.azure.com/oracle](http://www.azure.com/oracle)
EnhancedContent:
## Catch us as Gold Sponsors in a city near you – five stops, simplified migration, endless innovation!

Enterprises around the world are looking to do more with AI—but complexity often stands in the way. That’s why Microsoft and Oracle have partnered to deliver the most comprehensive, enterprise-ready solution for Oracle workloads in the public cloud. With Oracle Database@Azure, organizations can make mission-critical workloads AI-ready through simplified migration, integrated security, and AI-optimized infrastructure—backed by the broadest regional footprint for enterprise workloads. And because the service offers full parity with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) across solutions, pricing, licensing, and support, customers can modernize with confidence, knowing they get the same Oracle experience they rely on today, now integrated directly into Azure.

Attend one of the **Oracle AI World Tour** events below and stop by the Microsoft booth to speak with our experts, explore demos, and learn more about Oracle Database@Azure. Be sure to join our theater session, “How to Modernize Oracle Workloads with Oracle Database@Azure,” where you’ll discover how to streamline enterprise migration and modernization—from initial assessment to seamless migration and post-migration AI innovation. Learn how Microsoft security solutions like Sentinel and Defender help detect and remediate threats, while encryption and integrated key management help you meet strict regulatory and sovereignty requirements for secure, compliant data operations. Explore how Microsoft Foundry and Copilot Studio empowers organizations to transform Oracle estates into AI-driven environments. This session covers the full journey, offering tools and programs that accelerate secure, scalable deployments. Whether you’re beginning to explore AI or scaling enterprise innovation, you’ll leave with practical strategies to lead in the era of intelligent applications.

Join us at one of these five city stops:

- **Amsterdam, Netherlands** - [January 29](https://www.oracle.com/nl/ai-world-tour/)
- **London, United Kingdom** - [March 24](https://www.oracle.com/uk/ai-world-tour/)
- **Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates** – [March 26](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/)
- **New York City, United States** - [April 9](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/)
- **Tokyo, Japan** - [April 16](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/)

These events are free to attend. [Sign up](https://www.oracle.com/ai-world-tour/) today for more details!

Learn more about Oracle Database@Azure at [www.azure.com/oracle](http://www.azure.com/oracle)

Updated Dec 15, 2025
